name: Splashy Go
description:
#Capture monsters in a nightmare!
#Happy Halloween!

Capture those monsters! The ultimate capturing challenge! Blast monsters with your weapon in a nightmare.

Simple one-tap controls, defeat creepy creatures, switch your weapon, unlock super awesome characters, and even earn coins whilst you sleep!

- Halloween content is updated.
- Super challenging!
- Tons of characters and weapons to unlock!
- Lots of enemies and big bosses to defeat!
- Upgrade your damage, battery capacity, critical hits and more!
- Explore the forest, unlock chests, even collect gold butterflies!

Splashy Go! is completely free to play. However, some items can be purchased for real money.
Splashy Go! was developed by ADISCOPE.
